Alison Krauss - A Hundred Miles Or More (A Collection) [2007] [only1joe] FLAC-EAC

A Hundred Miles or More: A Collection is a compilation album by country/bluegrass artist Alison Krauss. It was released on April 3, 2007, and is a collection of new and old songs that Krauss has recorded. It features duets with Sting, Brad Paisley, John Waite, and James Taylor. The album debuted and peaked at #10 on the U.S. Billboard 200, and at #3 on the U.S. Top Country Albums, and #38 on the UK Albums Chart.[1]  Two singles were released from the album. The first, a cover song of the John Waite song, "Missing You", reached #34 on the Hot Country Songs chart. The second single, "Simple Love".
